mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS bookmarked_posts_count FROM free_board fb JOIN bookmark b ON fb.fr_seq = b.fr_seq WHERE b.user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) as liked_perfume_count from perfume p join heart h on p.per_seq = h.per_seq where h.id = #{userId}

select p.per_seq, p.per_name, p.per_brand, i.sysname, h.id from perfume p left join perfume_image i on p.per_seq = i.per_seq left join heart h on p.per_seq = h.per_seq where h.id = #{userId} order by p.per_seq asc
